function.name: /get_winlost_detail_report
function.description:
Retrieves a detailed report on win/loss statistics for betting activities, providing insights into a specific user's performance. The report includes information on total bets placed, total winnings, total losses, and other relevant metrics. It helps analyze betting performance over a specified period and provides a summary of all transactions made by the user or other specified users under the specific team. 
This report is useful for:
- Tracking individual betting activity or the performance.
- Analyzing win/loss trends.
- Understanding commissions and win/loss amount at different levels (Member, Agent, Master, Super).
- Evaluating overall profitability for the company.

The output of this function provides detailed metrics, including:
- **Bet Count**: Refers to the total number of bets placed by a user.
- **Turnover**: Refers to the total amount of money (stake) that a user has placed on bets, regardless of whether the bets win or lose.
- **Net Turnover**: (Also called Net Stake) Refers to the total amount wagered by a bettor, excluding any void or canceled bets and after deducting winnings from successful bets (if applicable).
- **Gross Comm**: Refers to the total commission generated before any deductions.
- **Win/Loss of Member**: The net result (profit/loss) of a member's betting activity.
- **Comm of Member**: The commission earned or deducted from the member's bets.
- **Total of Win/Loss and Comm of Member**: The combined total of the member's win/loss and commission.
- **Win/Loss of Agent**: The net result of all members under an agent.
- **Comm of Agent**: The commission earned or deducted at the agent level.
- **Total of Win/Loss and Comm of Agent**: The combined total of win/loss and commission at the agent level.
- **Win/Loss of Master**: The net result of all agents under a master.
- **Comm of Master**: The commission earned or deducted at the master level.
- **Total of Win/Loss and Comm of Master**: The combined total of win/loss and commission at the master level.
- **Win/Loss of Super**: The net result of all masters under a super.
- **Comm of Super**: The commission earned or deducted at the super level.
- **Total of Win/Loss and Comm of Super**: The combined total of win/loss and commission at the super level.
- **Company**: The overall win/loss at the company level after all calculations.
- **Reward (USD)**: The total rewards or bonuses awarded based on betting activity.

product.description: Filter by the type of product (default: All)

product_detail.description: Filter by specific games within the selected product (default: All)

level.description: Filter by level (All, Master Agent, Direct Member etc.).

user.description: Filter by a specific user or all downlines
